| `big_brain` | `True` | Whether this agent uses the configured smart LLM (default) to think,     as opposed to the configured fast LLM. Enabling this disables hybrid mode. |

## `core.brain.config.TransformerBrainConfig`

| Field | Default | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `layers` | `2` | Number of transformer encoder layers. |
| `heads` | `4` | Number of attention heads in each transformer layer. |
| `dim` | `256` | Dimensionality of the model. |
| `dropout` | `0.1` | Dropout probability used in transformer layers. |
| `learning_rate` | `1e-3` | Learning rate used during training. |
| `epochs` | `10` | Number of training epochs. |
| `batch_size` | `4` | Batch size for the training dataloader. |
